Package net.sf.sprockets.app.ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseNavigationDrawerFragment
    Google Play style (pre-Material Design) navigation drawer.
    NavigationDrawerActivity
    Manages the ActionBar during navigation drawer events according to the Android design guidelines.
    PanesActivity
    Manages two fragment panes that are either displayed next to each other or in a ViewPager, depending on screen size.
    ProgressBarFragment
    Displays a ProgressBar that is centred in its FrameLayout or RelativeLayout container.
    SprocketsActivity
    Injects content Views, saves the instance state of Icicle fields and restores them when recreated.
    SprocketsDialogFragment
    Injects content Views, saves the instance state of Icicle fields and restores them when recreated.
    SprocketsFragment
    Injects content Views, saves the instance state of Icicle fields and restores them when recreated.
    SprocketsListFragment
    Injects content Views, saves the instance state of Icicle fields and restores them when recreated, hides and restores the list's ActionMode as requested (e.g.
    SprocketsPreferenceFragment
    Sets preference values as their summary for RingtonePreference, MultiSelectListPreference, EditTextPreference, and Preference.
